cindy,

Unfortunately, the upload function here doesn't work at the moment.

I have uploaded The Bridge S01E03 to monova for now. It is labelled as S01E03 since the CTV website says that the 2 hour premiere on Mar 5 was 2 episodes.

The comment function here won't let me post the link. So to find the torrent, search google with:

the bridge s01e03 fat

and click the link from the monova site (currently the first link in the google results)
